content.title: Configure Arabic Locale
content.body:
1. In the Search field, enter: ar_AE.
    The Arabic locale for UAE.
  2. Select ar_AE.
  3. Under Mirror Default Layout select all checkboxes. These are for Flex Position Properties, Content Alignment and Flow Horizontal Alignment.
    This means that the content alignment will change when the language of the device is changed to Arabic (United Arab Emirates).
  4. Click OK to return to the Configure Internationalization window.
    You can see that three columns are added in this window: Key, en_US, ar_AE.
